member.name: M:Civil3D_DrawingProperties.ProjectProperties.GetDrawingUnits
member.summary: Method GetDrawingUnits return Units of current drawing as "Meters" ot "Feet" as string
member.returns: Units of current drawing as "Meters" ot "Feet"

member.name: M:Civil3D_DrawingProperties.ProjectProperties.CheckDrawingUnitsToEqualMeter(System.String)
member.summary: Method CheckDrawingUnitsToEqualMeter return true, if Units of drawing = Meters and false if isn't.

member.name: M:Civil3D_DrawingProperties.ProjectProperties.CheckDrawingUnitsToEqualFeets(System.String)
member.summary: Method CheckDrawingUnitsToEqualFeet return true, if Units of drawing = Feet and false if isn't.

member.name: M:Civil3D_DrawingProperties.ProjectProperties.ChangeDrawingUnitsToMetersBool(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Method ChangeDrawingUnitsToMetersBool changes Unit's system of drawing to Metric with input bool parameter = false (from f.e. CheckDrawingUnitsToEqualMeter). Otherwise Unit's system resetting to Imperial
member.param: Bool parameter; if bool = false, that method is active

member.name: M:Civil3D_DrawingProperties.ProjectProperties.ChangeDrawingUnitsToMeters
member.summary: Method ChangeDrawingUnitsToMeters changes Unit's system of drawing to Metric independently of drawing's parameters

member.name: M:Civil3D_DrawingProperties.ProjectProperties.ChangeDrawingUnitsToFeet
member.summary: Method ChangeDrawingUnitsToFeets changes Unit's system of drawing to Feet independently of drawing's parameters

member.name: M:Civil3D_DrawingProperties.ProjectProperties.AssignCoordinateSystem(System.String)
member.summary: Method AssignCoordinateSystem assign coordinate system of drawing from User's input string. Note: there are no checking if User's input is valid CS code in MAPCSLIBRARY.
member.param: String with code of Coordinate System that determine in MAPCSLIBRARY
